title: Metacognition-Based Online Instructional Design for School Library Practicum Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of library management systems and foundational information literacy concepts
context.additional_context: A Course Focused on Science Curriculum-Integrated Library Operations Practice, Conducted Through a Hybrid Model of Field Training and Online Sessions

learning_goals: One can plan and implement science curriculum-integrated library services in practical environments
One can establish practical improvement strategies based on metacognitive reflection on weekly practicum experiences
One can derive optimization plans for library practicum processes through peer learner feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
